trans-unit.resname: MIC·1 | Leinore, Autumn Sovereign | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Leinore, Autumn Sovereign
trans-unit.target: 暮秋君王蕾诺尔

trans-unit.resname: MIC·1 | Leinore, Autumn Sovereign | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Coven — At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control. Then if you control three or more creatures with different powers, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 鸠集～在你回合的战斗开始时，在至多一个目标由你操控的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。然后如果你操控三个或更多力量各不相同的生物，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MIC·1 | Leinore, Autumn Sovereign | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: She keeps the festival's revels from faltering, infusing the witches' rituals with hope.
trans-unit.target: 她让收成节欢庆得以延续，为女巫的仪式鼓舞希望。

trans-unit.resname: MIC·2 | Wilhelt, the Rotcleaver | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wilhelt, the Rotcleaver
trans-unit.target: 断腐尸威海特

trans-unit.resname: MIC·2 | Wilhelt, the Rotcleaver | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another Zombie you control dies, if it didn't have decayed, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个由你操控的灵俑死去时，若它不具败朽，则派出一个2/2黑色，具败朽异能的灵俑衍生生物。（它不能进行阻挡。当它攻击，在战斗结束时将它牺牲。）

trans-unit.resname: MIC·2 | Wilhelt, the Rotcleaver | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice a Zombie. If you do, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，你可以牺牲一个灵俑。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.target: 每当另一个由你操控的生物死去时，探查。（派出一个无色线索衍生神器，且具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌。」）

trans-unit.resname: MIC·3 | Eloise, Nephalia Sleuth | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 每当你牺牲一个衍生物时，刺探1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.source: "Even when the angels succumbed to madness, Sigarda stood strong. She is hope."
trans-unit.target: 「纵然天使尽皆陷入疯狂，席嘉妲依然坚毅不屈。她便是希望。」

trans-unit.target: 为战场上生物中每种不同的力量值各选择一个力量为该值的生物。消灭所有未以此法选择的生物。

trans-unit.source: "I was going to suggest silver, but a beam of pure angelic fury works even better."\n—Rem Karolus, Fiendslayer
trans-unit.target: 「我本来想建议用银，但天使纯粹怒火效果更好。」 ～邪鬼克星连卡洛
